meanings.definition: Not in accordance with ecological principles or practices.
meanings.sent2: Dumping chemicals into rivers is unecological.
meanings.sent3: It's unecological to throw trash out of the car window.
meanings.sent4: The factory's smokestacks belched out unecological fumes.
meanings.sent5: The unecological practices of the company led to environmental damage.

meanings.sent1: Cutting down trees recklessly is unecological.
meanings.sent3: Leaving the lights on all night is unecological and wasteful.
meanings.sent4: The unecological pesticides harmed the local wildlife.
meanings.sent5: The unecological actions of the corporation polluted the air and water.

meanings.definition: Lacking consideration for the natural world.
meanings.sent1: Building a mall in the middle of a forest is unecological.
meanings.sent2: Using harmful chemicals on crops is unecological farming.
meanings.sent3: Throwing garbage into the ocean is unecological and irresponsible.
meanings.sent4: The unecological development destroyed the habitats of many animals.
meanings.sent5: The unecological mindset of the company led to irreversible damage to the ecosystem.
